title: In and Out
subtle: Realistic (fiction), 31 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile BR10L
description: Cats and dogs leap in and then out of a big mud puddle. Next, cows leap in and out of the mud puddle. Readers will delight in what happens when the final visitors, the pigs, jump into the mud.
reviewWords: cats, cows, dogs, in, mud, out, pigs
comprehension: Identify Character, Setting and Plot                : Identify story elements of characters, setting, and plot
grammar: Capitalization and Punctuation                : Identify when to use capital letters and appropriate ending punctuation in sentences
wordWork: Antonyms                : Identify words that are opposites (antonyms)
